Description: Front view of abdominal region from lower ribcage to pubic area, including umbilicus and linea alba
Acupuncture_Points: 24 points (Ren/CV: CV 2-14; Stomach: ST 19-30; Kidney: KI 11-21; Spleen: SP 13-16)

Description: Side view of shoulder including deltoid muscle, acromion process, and scapular area
Back view of neck from occiput to upper thoracic spine, showing trapezius and cervical vertebrae
WHO_Pharmacopeia_Reference: WHO Standard 2008 - Posterior neck region pp.104, 95, 181-182, 210-211

Description: Palmar view showing thenar/hypothenar eminences, palmar creases, and finger web spaces
Acupuncture_Points: 6 points (Pericardium: PC 7-8; Heart: HT 7-9; Lung: LU 10)

Description: Dorsal hand showing extensor tendons, metacarpal bones, and web spaces between fingers
Acupuncture_Points: 18 points (LI 1-5; SI 1-5; TE 1-4; Hand microsystem points)

Description: Side view of scalp from forehead hairline to occipital area for neurological scalp acupuncture
Acupuncture_Points: 28 points (Bladder: BL 3-9; GB 4-20; scalp zones for motor/sensory cortex)
WHO_Pharmacopeia_Reference: WHO Standard 2008 - Scalp region pp.101-104, 173-181; Scalp acupuncture zones (Yamamoto, Jiao method)

Description: Detailed front facial view showing nasolabial folds, philtrum, and facial landmarks
Acupuncture_Points: 32 points (Stomach: ST 1-8; LI 19-20; GB 1-3; BL 1-2; GV 24-28)

Description: Front knee view showing patella, patellar tendon, and surrounding joint structures
Acupuncture_Points: 11 points (Stomach: ST 34-35; Spleen: SP 10; Liver: LR 8; Extra points: Xiyan)

Description: Side view of ankle showing malleoli, Achilles tendon, and ankle joint
WHO_Pharmacopeia_Reference: WHO Standard 2008 - Ankle lateral aspect pp.129-131, 137-138, 191

Description: Back view of sacral region showing posterior sacral foramina and sacral dimples
Side view showing sternocleidomastoid muscle, anterior/posterior triangles of neck
Acupuncture_Points: 14 points (Stomach: ST 9-11; LI 17-18; SI 16-17; TE 16-17; GB 12)

Description: Front neck view showing throat, hyoid bone, thyroid cartilage, and suprasternal notch
Front shoulder showing clavicle, anterior deltoid, and upper pectoral region
Back shoulder showing scapula, infrascapular region, and trapezius muscle
Inner ankle showing medial malleolus and three yin meridians pathway
Acupuncture_Points: 9 points (Kidney: KI 3-7; Spleen: SP 5-6; Liver: LR 4)

Description: Side knee view showing fibular head, lateral condyle, and iliotibial band
Inner knee showing medial condyle, pes anserinus, and three yin meridians
Acupuncture_Points: 5 points (Spleen: SP 9-10; Kidney: KI 10; Liver: LR 7-8)

Description: Back of knee showing popliteal fossa, hamstring tendons, and gastrocnemius heads
